section.name: Powered By
section.p: The table below gives informations about applications developed using DbForms. Select the related link for further informations and screenshots !

tr.td: pow2ACL gives access control list facility to web applications. It provides a JSP tag library and custom Struts action classes.
pow2ContentManagement is a toolkit useful to build content-driven applications like electronic catalogs and e-commerce sites.

section.name: DbForms companion
section.p: The table below lists some applications that could be used with DbForms to enhance the features of your applications:

tr.td: pow2WebGui is a web gui framework useful to build and render visual components.
